title: The Salon in the Montpensier Wing, Palais Royal
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection;  Galerie Jacques Fischer, Paris
medium: Brush and watercolor over graphite, brush and white gouache on tan wove paper
description: This view of the long Salon shows a highly polished parquet floor, a symmetrical formal arrangement of neoclassical furniture, and a parade of crystal chandeliers and wall lights. The chimneypiece appears to be decorated with ormolu motifs of the period.
name: Drawing
